page.title: 03Wealthy residents life style
page.content: On the side of Lincombe Hill there are many big houses.Nowadays these are mostly old people's homes and flats.There are many hotels and guest houses too.These house get a view of Meadfoot Beach and the people living there are probably wealthy.The best house is in Hesketh Crescent-The Osborne.Part of the Osborne is a good hotel and part is Time Share flats.The Marine Drive was built in the early Twentieth Century and goes around the headland by Hope's Nose.At the end of Marine Drive by Meadfoot Beach are the Kilmore Flats.All of these properties are very expensive.There are very good houses in Oxlea Road too.Many house have swimming pools and most of them look out over Torbay.Thatcher Avenue is named after Thatcher Rock-not Mrs.Thatcher!Some theatrical stars live around Wellswood.
